x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: Checks Upgrade History for Reservation Related scripts that might have been skipped
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Upgrade History - Res
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Go to the Upgrade History and revert them to base system.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_1293562d1ba4d510ae5b21b5ec4bcbe7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Checks Upgrade History for Reservation Related scripts that might have been skipped</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Upgrade History - Res</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Go to the Upgrade History and revert them to base system. </remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var skippedChanges = util.checkUpgradeHistory('reser');

if (skippedChanges == true) {
	util.handleOutput('There are files related to Reservations that were skipped during the last upgrade/Installation. Please check the upgrade history for the following scripts, and revert them to base system if needed: ' + util.listSkippedChanges('res'), 'Warning','Reservation');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-07 15:11:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>1293562d1ba4d510ae5b21b5ec4bcbe7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Upgrade History - Res</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_1293562d1ba4d510ae5b21b5ec4bcbe7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:27</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
